carousel.description: an interference pattern between two sounds of slightly different frequencies, perceived as a periodic variation in volume whose rate is the difference of the two frequencies.

It is an evolution of the original Oculus with a similar design, but with a lighter weight, updated internal specifications, a display with a higher refresh rate and per-eye resolution, and updated Oculus Touch controllers with improved battery life.

It is an evolution of the original Oculus with a similar design, but with a lighter weight, updated internal specifications, a display with a higher refresh rate and per-eye resolution, and updated Oculus Touch controllers with improved battery life.

Versatile performance and designed for adaptability, no matter what adventure you chase, the 360 hinge gives you the flexibility to get things done, whether in tablet, tent, stand or laptop modes, and an active pen allows for natural writing.

HUAWEI WATCH FIT Special Edition features a lightweight body of just 21 g and is only 10.7 mm thin. It's gorgeous AMOLED display with ultra-clear pixel resolution achieves an incredibly immersive visual experience.

The best audio solution not matter the device, JBL Live Pro+ TWS delivers an immersive True Wireless experience with incredible JBL Signature Sound. Let Smart Ambient connect you to your environment, or focus on the music with Adaptive Noise Cancelling.

news.description: Exciting News! Our latest product has arrived, and it’s an imported gem! While we generally do not sell parallel imported products, sometimes it’s the only way to get in-demand items in our customers' hands. While this product has been imported without the approval or license of the registered owner of the trade mark, you can rest assured that this product is fully supported by us and our local supplier, and it is fully backed by our famous after-sales service and warranty support.
Beats Solo 4: New on-ear headphones. Notable upgrades include custom 40mm transducers and a claimed 50 hours of battery life.
This year, ASUS has been announced as the official partner of the all-new Decorex Design Summit continues with the final Johannesburg leg on 29 July 2022.
